title: ****9/1 COMM AVE-PACKARDS CORNER LARGE 3BED/1.5 BA STEPS TO BU & MBTA!
map_address: Commonwealth Ave near Saint Luke's Rd
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE:', '09/01/2022', "A very spacious, and updated 3 bed/1.5 bath rental apartment located on Commonwealth Ave in Packard's Corner Boston.", 'The unit is located in a professionally managed building that is located just steps to the MBTA Green Line,  Boston University, Harvard Ave, Brookline & Beacon St, Longwood Medical, Boston Landing, and Boston College!', ' Heat and Hot Water are included in the rent price and there is shared laundry in the building.', ' No dogs.', 'Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'BenC @', 'Benjaminapartments .', 'com', 'Transportation', 'Bus: 66 Harvard Ave @ Commonwealth Ave (0.22 mi)', 'Tram: B Packards Corner (0.07 mi)', 'Bus: 57 Brighton Ave @ Comm Ave (0.09 mi)', 'Bus: 64 Cambridge St @ Linden St (0.42 mi)']
